about_the_game:
Summon your courage and gird your loins! Invoke twenty tracks of mighty music inspired by the Greek, Roman, and Norse gods from composers Joel Steudler and Nick Vest! You can hear and see the real instruments of ancient times in Nick's five tracks of authentic lyre music and the pictoral guidebook showcasing his collection of lyres and Aulos pipes. The rest is a myriad of mythological music to enliven your most Olympian projects or chart your path on the rainbow bridge!

Contents:

* 20 BGM tracks suitable for battles, dungeons, themes, and towns!
* .ogg, and .m4a formats included.
* Celestial Lyres Instrument Guide .pdf included. See the lyres played in the pack!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games

Summon your courage and gird your loins! Invoke twenty tracks of mighty music inspired by the Greek, Roman, and Norse gods from composers Joel Steudler and Nick Vest! You can hear and see the real instruments of ancient times in Nick's five tracks of authentic lyre music and the pictoral guidebook showcasing his collection of lyres and Aulos pipes.
